title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, August 20, 2020
description: On this day 80 years ago, Winston Churchill said, "Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day 80 years ago, Winston Churchill said, "Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few."
